description: Try our easy to follow Salted Caramel Dollops recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Salted Caramel Dollops Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: In a small saucepan combine 100g WESTERN STAR CHEF’S CHOICE Butter, golden syrup and NESTLE Sweetened Condensed Milk, stir constantly over low heat for 10-15 minutes or until thickened slightly and caramel in colour. Set aside to cool slightly.
Preheat oven to 170°C/150°C fan forced. Grease and line 2 baking trays with baking paper.

Using an electric mixer, beat 125g WESTERN STAR CHEF’S CHOICE Butter and CSR Brown Sugar until pale and creamy, add egg; beat until just combined. Stir in WHITE WINGS flour, salt and NESTLE BAKERS’ CHOICE Milk CHOC BITS. Mix until well combined.
Roll level tablespoons of mixture into balls; place 4cm apart on prepared trays; gently press down on cookies to flatten slightly. Bake for 10 minutes.
Carefully remove from oven; use the end of lightly floured wooden spoon to make a hole in the centre of cookie.

Divide caramel mixture amongst holes, being careful not to overfill. Return to oven and bake a further 6-7 minutes or until caramel is bubbly and cookie is golden. Set aside on trays for 15-20 minutes or until caramel is completely cool.
